pr_title: android, cronet, android-interop-testing: bump Android versions

timeline.message: Bump Android SDK version for grpc-cronet; migrate to androidX.
Bump Android SDK version for grpc-android, suppressed warnings for using deprecated NetworkInfo API, which is intended for supporting old API version; migrate to androidX.
Bump Android SDK version for android-interop-testing, migrate to androidX, bump its corresponding dependency versions.
Add annotation to emulate Android 28 for cronet tests.
Add annotation to emulate Android 28 for cronet tests.
Bump Android SDK version for grpc-cronet; migrate to androidX; add annotation to emulate Android 28 for cronet tests.
Bump Android SDK version for grpc-android, suppressed warnings for using deprecated NetworkInfo API, which is intended for supporting old API version; migrate to androidX.
Bump Android SDK version for android-interop-testing, migrate to androidX, bump its corresponding dependency versions.

timeline.author: ejona86

replies.bodyText: Shall we avoid using alpha versions? I was just upgrading everything to versions as latest as possible.
replies.author: voidzcy

timeline.message: Merge branch 'bugfix/bump_android_sdk_versions' of github.com:voidzcy/grpc-java into bugfix/bump_android_sdk_versions
